summary: Provides a lightweight system for creating, storing, and serving simple static web pages within a Django project, including a model definition, form handling, view rendering, middleware fallback for missing URLs, and sitemap integration.
business_intent: Enables developers and site administrators to manage static content pages (e.g., terms, about, help) without a full CMS, ensuring proper URL formatting, optional access control, automatic delivery on 404s, and inclusion in search engine sitemaps.
